author: AudioDiversity

text:
The thing I love most about the Tekken 2 soundtrack is its heavy emphasis on rather calm but also atmospheric theme songs.
I prefer that to the loud dubstep music that is mainly used in the newer Tekken games.
author: Owari Dragon

text: You wouldn't think this theme plays during the Mid Boss fight if you haven't played the game. For those who did play this game, you'd probably associate it with "OK, now these fighters are getting serious". On a related note, I'm cautiously excited for Pokken Tournament. I certainly like the concept of having Pokémon fight Tekken-style!

+SupraDarky 
I'm surprised this isn't Yoshimitsu'a theme from TTT, that's usually the #1 standout song from Tekken's history--to me, at least.
